titleStmt.title: Nine books of physick and chirurgery written by that great and learned physitian, Dr Sennertus. The first five being his Institutions of the whole body of physick: the other four of fevers and agues: with their differences, signs, and cures.
titleStmt.author: Sennert, Daniel, 1572-1637.

titleStmt.title: Nine books of physick and chirurgery written by that great and learned physitian, Dr Sennertus. The first five being his Institutions of the whole body of physick: the other four of fevers and agues: with their differences, signs, and cures.
titleStmt.author: Sennert, Daniel, 1572-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.M. for Lodowick Lloyd, at the Castle in Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: Includes: The institutions or fundamentals of the whole art, both of physick and chirurgery, with separate dated title page; The first ground or fundamentals of the whole art of physick, and chirurgery, with a caption title; Doctor D. Sennertus of agues and fevers, (Wing S2538) with a separate dated title page, pagination and register.
With an [8] p. advertisement section bound in before "Doctor Sennertus of agues and fevers".
"Doctor D. Sennertus of agues and fevers" also appears separately at reel 2077:22 identified as Wing S2538.
Imperfect; pages cropped and stained, with faded print and slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
